Text: FW Revised Enron LNG Document Cc below our comments to the captioned agreement based on yesterdays meeting I have not read the changes very closely but in an effort of speed please see the changes below Any final agreement is subject to management approval Alan Kilpatrick mailto Original Message From Bailey Donna SMTP mailtoSMTP Sent Thursday May PM To Alan M Kilpatrick Cc William Norrie McKenzie Subject Revised Enron LNG Document FBRREDrtf doc Alan here are clean and redlined versions of the above agreement The only thing in here that we have not discussed is language obligating Enron to provide us with copies of their LNG agreements with El Paso so that you have an opportunity to evaluate them before having to decide whether to take assignment of them Call if I failed to capture everything we discussed correctly Donna J Bailey Balch Bingham llp Sixth Avenue North Birmingham Alabama direct dial facsimile mailto website address wwwbalchcom This transmission is intended for the sole use of the addressee and may contain information that by its privileged and confidential nature is exempt from disclosure under applicable law You are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or duplication of this transmission by someone other than the intended recipient or its designated agent is strictly prohibited If you have received this transmission in error please notify the sender immediately by replying to this transmission or by collect call to the above phone number FBRREDrtf doc
